com.metreeca.rest.handlers

Class Updater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Delegator
      • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Actor
        • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Updater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public final class Updater
extends Actor
    Model-driven resource updater.

    Performs:

    • role-based request shape redaction and shape-based authorization, considering shapes enabled by the Shape.Update task and the Shape.Holder area, when operating on collections, or the Shape.Detail area, when operating on other resources;
    • engine-assisted request payload validation;
    • engine assisted resource updating.

    All operations are executed inside a single engine transaction.
